DOC.brief_summary: TRACE Multicentre Retrospective Study plan gather follow data period 1 year order understand anti-thrombotic management pattern outcomes Acute Coronary Syndrome patient India . This retrospective study design provide rapid quick analysis exist database ACS patient . So ensure quality check study , pilot study conduct around 500 patient 10 centre across India base meaningful result pilot study , full retrospective multi-centric study initiate various select centre across India . This study use available registry data define time period Jan 2007-Dec 2009 .
DOC.brief_title: Multicentre Retrospective Study Understand Anti-thrombotic Treatment Patterns Outcomes Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS ) Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients age 18 year old hospitalize ACS within previous 3 year . Diagnosis STEMI , NSTEMI UA use Standard Universal Definition Myocardial Infarction UA , STEMI NSTEMI precipitate complication surgery , trauma , GI bleed postPCI . UA , STEMI NSTEMI occur patient already hospitalize reason
